page.title: 16ETTINGTON C.of E. SCHOOL
page.content: Ettington Church of England Primary School is a school of about 130 children aged between four and a half years and eleven.At present their are five full time teachers, a part time teacher and a part time helper.There are also three cooks who make school dinners for the children and for Newbold School, who no longer have kitchen facilities and there are two cleaners who come in after school has finished to keep the school clean. The school is housed in buildings which date back to the 1960's,the old school buildings having fallen into a bad state of repair and been sold for renovation and conversion into a private house.There is a good sized playing field with football pitch jumping pits and outdoor swimming pool.
